title: Innovative Financing for Development: Scalable Business Models that Produce Economic, Social, and Environmental Outcomes
summary: The Innovative Financing for Development report describes the innovative financing landscape and how expanded use of these mechanisms can promote development outcomes. The report, created by Dalberg Global Development Advisors and the Global Development Incubator and funded by the Citi Foundation and The Agence FranÃ§aise de DÃ©veloppement, aims to accelerate the growth of innovative financing by creating a common language and vision for leaders in both the public and private sectors to use as they explore innovative financing opportunities to drive positive social and environmental impacts.
